info.name: The Aviation Herald Mobile - No adds
info.description:
Same as The Aviation Herald Modernized with :
- No adds
- Wider display of content

Fits better for mobiles.

Please consider my other style, The Aviation Herald Modernized, for that it thanks and supports the team of avherald by showing some adds. Myself I would appreciate the move.

---------------
A simple, clear, humble new style for this awesome, lovely, powerfull website.
Couldn't do miracles, this website's HTML is very oldschool. 
To me, with this style it's softer to read and clearer.
